author: bainbrid
body:
#### PR description:

This PR relies on the following PR: https://github.com/cms-data/RecoEgamma-ElectronIdentification/pull/17 (UPDATED!)

- Adds low-pT electrons to MINIAOD by default
- Updates the ID ("2020Sept15" from BParking studies)
- Keeps only a subset of low-pT electrons (BDT score>1.5, mistag ~10%, efficiency ~90%) 
- Embed informations in the pat::Electron, and drops RECO collections
- Stores GBRForest object (for ID) in ROOT file format rather than XML, fixes [this](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/28780) issue
- Uses the `run2_miniAOD_UL` modifier to run PAT on existing RECO/AOD samples

#### PR validation:

- Tested locally with wfs () 
- Tested with a standalone "unit test" module. 
- Tested against PR #31220 to ensure consistent output.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

- This PR is a back port of cms-sw/cmssw#31080
- These developments will be used as part of the re-miniAOD UltraLegacy campaign. 

@slava77 @guitargeek @crovelli @afiqaize @SohamBhattacharya @jpata @jainshilpi @lsoffi
title: Add low-pT electrons to MINIAOD, update ID, improve end user experience (back port of 31220)
